keyMappings:
unmap J
unmap K
map J nextTab
map K previousTab

unmap d
unmap u
unmap x
unmap X
map d removeTab
map u restoreTab

map <C-d> scrollPageDown
map <C-u> scrollPageUp

unmap b
map <Space>b Vomnibar.activateTabSelection

map <Space><Space> visitPreviousTab

unmap <a-f>
map ;f LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map ;d LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink
map ;y LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl


map gd0 closeTabsOnLeft
map gd$ closeTabsOnRight
map gdd closeOtherTabs
